item.title: 花旗集团晋升三位银行家推动医疗并购
item.description: 路透社周二看到的一份内部备忘录显示，花旗集团已经提拔了三位资深医疗保健投资银行家--Sumit Khedekar、Nishant Jadav 和 Michael Guarino，以推动该行在该行业赢得更多交易。【原文：Citigroup has promoted three senior healthcare investment bankers - Sumit Khedekar, Nishant Jadav and Michael Guarino - in the bank's push to win more deals in the industry, an internal memo seen by Reuters on Tuesday showed.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，Five9 在成本和董事会席位问题上面临激进军团的压力
item.description: 两位熟悉内情的消息人士周二透露，Legion Partners 已持有 Five9 公司的股份，并正在推动获得董事会席位和削减成本，成为第二家买入这家美国呼叫中心软件公司股票的激进投资者。【原文：Legion Partners has built a stake in Five9 and is pushing for a board seat and cost cuts, two sources familiar with the matter said on Tuesday, making it the second activist investor to buy into the U.S. call center software firm's stock.】

item.title: 特百惠取消拍卖，同意贷款人收购
item.description: 破产的特百惠品牌公司（Tupperware Brands）周二同意以 2350 万美元的现金和 6300 多万美元的债务减免向一组贷款人出售其业务，取消了在公开市场拍卖其资产的计划。【原文：Bankrupt Tupperware Brands agreed on Tuesday to sell its business to a group of lenders for $23.5 million in cash and over $63 million in debt relief, canceling its plans for an open-market auction of its assets.】

item.title: 欧莱雅第三季度销售额不及预期，原因是中国市场购买减少
item.description: 法国化妆品巨头欧莱雅周二公布的第三季度销售额增幅低于预期，原因是中国消费者信心不足，削弱了对美容产品的需求。【原文：French cosmetics giant L'Oreal reported a rise in third quarter sales on Tuesday that missed expectations after low consumer confidence in China sapped demand for beauty products.】

item.title: 如果平台恢复访问，Roblox 计划在土耳其开设办事处
item.description: 视频游戏平台 Roblox 周二表示，如果土耳其恢复对该平台的访问，它计划根据当地法律在土耳其开设办事处。【原文：Video game platform Roblox said on Tuesday it plans to open an office in Turkey in line with local laws if access is restored to the platform, which Ankara blocked over concerns that some content could lead to child abuse.】

item.title: 通用电气航空航天集团首席执行官表示，将努力满足 LEAP 发动机的需求
item.description: 通用电气航空航天公司首席执行官拉里-卡尔普（Larry Culp）表示，该公司正在努力提高产量，以满足对LEAP发动机的需求，该发动机为空客和波音窄体飞机提供动力。【原文：GE Aerospace CEO Larry Culp said the company is working to ramp up production to keep up with demand for LEAP engines, which power Airbus and Boeing narrowbody aircraft.】

item.title: 据《纽约时报》报道，摩根大通首席执行官戴蒙将考虑在哈里斯政府中发挥作用
item.description: 据《纽约时报》周二报道，如果民主党副总统卡马拉-哈里斯（Kamala Harris）赢得美国总统大选，摩根大通首席执行官杰米-戴蒙（Jamie Dimon）将考虑担任一个角色，也许是财政部长。【原文：JPMorgan Chase CEO Jamie Dimon would consider a role, perhaps that of the treasury secretary, if Democratic Vice President Kamala Harris wins the U.S. presidential election, the New York Times reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 耶伦：尚未看到中国解决消费支出低迷问题的政策
item.description: 美国财政部长珍妮特-耶伦（Janet Yellen）周二表示，她尚未看到中国公布政策来解决消费支出占经济比重低的问题。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen on Tuesday said she has not yet seen policies announced by China that would address its low level of consumer spending as a share of its economy.】

item.title: 汇丰银行的帕姆-考尔在重大改革中打破了玻璃天花板
item.description: 汇丰银行创造历史的新任首席财务官帕姆-考尔（Pam Kaur）是一位身经百战的风险和审计老将，她将自己的成功归功于 "智的力量"。【原文：HSBC's history-making new chief financial officer Pam Kaur is a battle-hardened risk and audit veteran who credits her success to the "Power of Chi".】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，台积电在 TechInsights 发现华为设备中的芯片后告知美国
item.description: 据一位熟悉此事的人士透露，台湾中芯国际集成电路制造股份有限公司几周前通知美国，在技术研究公司 TechInsights 的拆解后，在华为设备中发现了该公司的一款芯片。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company notified the U.S. a couple of weeks ago that one of its chips had been found in a Huawei device after a teardown by the tech research firm TechInsights, according to a person familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 纽约市主计长兰德将终止私人市场化石燃料投资
item.description: 纽约市主计长布拉德-兰德（Brad Lander）周二概述了因气候问题而终止某些养老基金未来对化石燃料基础设施的私人市场投资的计划。【原文：New York City Comptroller Brad Lander on Tuesday outlined plans to end certain pension funds' future private market investments in fossil fuel infrastructure over climate concerns.】

item.title: 消息人士称，大坝灾难协议应能遏制针对淡水河谷和必和必拓的诉讼
item.description: 三位接近此事的消息人士称，淡水河谷公司、必和必拓公司及其合资企业萨马科公司（Samarco）就巴西一次致命的溃坝事故达成的支付1,700亿雷亚尔（合298.5亿美元）赔偿金的协议，可能会结束在南美国家针对这些矿业公司的百余起诉讼，并可能限制在国外的法律诉讼。【原文：An agreement by Vale , BHP and their joint venture Samarco to pay 170 billion reais ($29.85 billion) in compensation for a deadly dam collapse in Brazil could end more than a hundred lawsuits against the mining companies in the South American country and possibly limit legal action abroad, three sources close to the matter said.】

item.title: JM Smucker 将斥资 3.05 亿美元剥离饼干品牌 Voortman
item.description: J.M. Smucker 周二表示，将以 3.05 亿美元的全现金交易将其饼干品牌 Voortman 出售给美国高端零食制造商 Second Name Brands。【原文：J.M. Smucker said on Tuesday it would sell its cookie brand, Voortman, to U.S.-based premium snacks maker Second Name Brands in a $305 million all-cash deal.】

item.title: 路透社活动：克莱斯勒品牌首席执行官称墨西哥工厂扩建是 "减压阀"
item.description: 克莱斯勒品牌首席执行官克里斯蒂娜-费尔（Christine Feuell）周二在底特律出席路透社活动时表示，Stellantis 正在扩建其位于墨西哥的卡车工厂，作为美国卡车工厂的 "减压阀"，该工厂预计将在未来达到产能。【原文：Stellantis is expanding its truck plant in Mexico as a "relief valve" for a U.S. truck factory that is expected to reach capacity in the future, Chrysler brand CEO Christine Feuell said Tuesday on the sidelines of a Reuters event in Detroit.】

item.title: 罗技首席执行官称全球消费者信心保持良好
item.description: 罗技（Logitech）国际公司首席执行官汉内克-法贝尔（Hanneke Faber）周二表示，随着电脑键盘和鼠标制造商进入圣诞节前的季度，罗技国际公司预计消费者信心将保持强劲。【原文：Logitech International expects consumer confidence to remain robust as the computer keyboard and mouse-maker heads into its pre-Christmas quarter, Chief Executive Hanneke Faber said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 采埃孚表示 Wolfspeed 负责德国芯片厂项目
item.description: 汽车供应商采埃孚（ZF）周二表示，美国芯片制造商 Wolfspeed 负责德国西部计划中的微芯片制造项目，此前有业内消息称德国公司打算退出该计划。【原文：U.S. chipmaker Wolfspeed is responsibile for the microchip manufacturing project planned in western Germany, automotive supplier ZF said on Tuesday, after an industry source said the German company intends to withdraw from the plan.】

item.title: 美国官员称 "尽快 "敲定电动汽车改装补助金事宜
item.description: 美国能源部长詹妮弗-格兰霍姆（Jennifer Granholm）周二表示，能源部正在 "以最快的速度 "敲定17亿美元的拨款，用于资助工厂转产电动汽车和零部件。【原文：U.S. Energy Secretary Jennifer Granholm said Tuesday the department is working "as fast as we can" to finalize $1.7 billion in grants to fund the conversion of plants to build electric vehicles and components.】

item.title: Peloton 将在好市多部分门店销售高端健身车
item.description: 两家公司周二表示，Peloton 计划在 11 月 1 日至 2 月 15 日期间在好市多的一些美国门店和该零售商的网站上销售其高端健身车。【原文：Peloton plans to sell its high-end exercise bikes at some of Costco's U.S. stores and on the retailer's website between Nov. 1 and Feb. 15, the companies said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称全球市场可能低估了地缘政治风险
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二表示，近期全球金融风险已得到控制，但货币政策宽松可能会助长资产价格泡沫，而且市场可能低估了军事冲突和即将举行的选举所带来的风险。【原文：Near-term global financial risks are contained, but monetary policy easing could fuel asset price bubbles and markets might be underestimating risks posed by military conflicts and impending elections, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 据 The Information 报道，亚马逊为 Temu 竞争对手商店制定超低定价计划
item.description: 据《信息报》周二报道，亚马逊公司正在对商家在该电子商务巨头准备推出的一个新的低成本店面上的产品价格设置严格的上限。【原文：Amazon.com is imposing severe price caps on what merchants can charge for their products on a new low-cost storefront that the e-commerce giant is preparing to launch, the Information reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 贝莱德利用两只新 ETF 投身人工智能热潮
item.description: 资产管理巨头贝莱德（BlackRock）周二推出了两只新的交易所交易基金（ETF），旨在让投资者接触蓬勃发展的人工智能市场。【原文：Asset management giant BlackRock on Tuesday launched two new exchange-traded funds (ETFs) aimed at giving investors exposure to the booming market for artificial intelligence.】

item.title: Starboard Value 首席执行官称辉瑞董事会应追究管理层责任
item.description: 激进对冲基金 Starboard Value 的首席投资官杰弗里-史密斯（Jeffrey Smith）周二表示，制药商辉瑞公司的董事会需要让管理层对其业绩不佳负责。【原文：Activist hedge fund Starboard Value's chief investment officer Jeffrey Smith said on Tuesday that drugmaker Pfizer Inc's board needs to hold management accountable for its underperformance.】

item.title: 沃尔玛最快 30 分钟送达处方药
item.description: 沃尔玛周二表示，作为其新的快递服务选项的一部分，它将在 30 分钟内把处方药和药品补充剂与杂货和其他商品一起作为一个订单送达。【原文：Walmart said on Tuesday it will now deliver prescription medicines and medication refills as a single order along with groceries and other items as soon as 30 minutes, as part of its new express delivery option.】

item.title: 诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）因铁路服务和运输量的改善而发布乐观的季度财报
item.description: 本周二，美国铁路运营商诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）公布的第三季度利润和收入高于华尔街预期，主要得益于其商品和多式联运业务的强劲表现。【原文：U.S. railroad operator Norfolk Southern reported third-quarter profit and revenue above Wall Street estimates on Tuesday, helped by strength in its merchandise and intermodal segments.】

item.title: 独家报道：俄罗斯将利用船对船液化天然气装载来释放冰级油轮
item.description: 一份项目文件草案周二显示，俄罗斯计划在巴伦支海和白令海安排液化天然气和天然气凝析油的船对船转运，以便为其最大的液化天然气生产商诺瓦泰克公司（Novatek）腾出更多的冰级油轮。【原文：Russia plans to arrange ship-to-ship transfers of liquefied natural gas and gas condensate in the Barents and Bering Seas to free up more ice-class tankers for its biggest LNG producer, Novatek , a draft project document showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 台积电称已提醒美国可能违反中国 AI 芯片禁令
item.description: 台湾积体电路制造股份有限公司（台积电）周二表示，已向美国通报华为可能试图规避美国禁止芯片制造商为中国公司生产人工智能芯片的出口管制。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Company (TSMC) said on Tuesday it has informed the United States of a potential attempt by Huawei to circumvent U.S. export controls prohibiting the chipmaker from producing AI chips for the Chinese company.】

item.title: 美国联邦航空局敲定空中出租车飞行员培训和认证规则
item.description: 美国联邦航空管理局（Federal Aviation Administration）周二表示，正在最终确定空中出租车飞行的综合培训和飞行员认证规则，以解决电动垂直起降飞机部署的一个关键障碍。【原文：The Federal Aviation Administration said on Tuesday it was finalizing comprehensive training and pilot certification rules for flying air taxis, addressing a key hurdle to the deployment of electric vertical takeoff and landing aircraft.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织上调 2024 年拉美经济增长预期
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）周二表示，拉丁美洲和加勒比地区今年的国内生产总值（GDP）将增长 2.1%，比 7 月份的预测高出十分之三个百分点，此前该组织修订了该地区两个最大经济体的增长预测。【原文：GDP in Latin America and the Caribbean is set to grow 2.1% this year, three-tenths of a percentage point more than projected in July, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday, after revising growth forecasts for the region's two largest economies.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织称，向电动汽车的转变将产生深远影响
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二在更新全球经济增长预测时表示，全球向电动汽车的过渡将对投资、生产、国际贸易和就业产生 "深远 "影响。【原文：The global transition toward electric vehicles will have "far-reaching" impacts on investment, production, international trade and employment, the International Monetary Fund said on Tuesday as part of its update to global economic growth forecasts.】

item.title: 国际货币基金组织（IMF）上调美国经济增长预期，但下调中国经济预期；全球经济乏善可陈
item.description: 国际货币基金组织周二上调了对美国、巴西和英国2024年经济增长的预测，但下调了对中国、日本和欧元区的预测，并补充说，武装冲突、潜在的新贸易战以及紧缩货币政策带来的负面影响等风险依然存在。【原文：The International Monetary Fund on Tuesday raised its 2024 economic growth forecasts for the U.S., Brazil and Britain but cut them for China, Japan and the euro zone, adding that risks abound from armed conflicts, potential new trade wars and the hangover from tight monetary policy.】
